subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Historically and academically considered a {{Han compound|勿|心|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=heart}}. Colloquially explained as an {{Han compound|勿|心|ls=ic|t1=not|t2=heart}}.
